cause.description:
It is our goal to support Dylan Shade and Joshua Ikebuchi as they further their education at a post-secondary level. With your support these two classy gentlemen can become productive members of society.
Please show your support for them as they venture out into the world of university.
1. Dylan Shade and Josh Ikebuchi are awesome (well at least Josh is)
2. Their friends are the kindest people in the world and their generosity and spirit of giving is unrivalled.
3. Dylan needs beer money.
4. Josh is devastatingly good looking
5. Dylan and Josh are awesome at video games
6. Our beliefs are so potent, all the ladies reading this are now pregnant
7. Dylan and Josh bleed Copper and Blue
8. We would give our appendix for the right cause
9. Dylan has the greatest Poker-Face of all time. He won the 1983 World Series of Poker, despite holding only a Joker, a Get out of Jail Free Monopoloy card, a 2 of clubs, 7 of spades and a green #4 card from the game UNO.
10. Dylan loves the smell of Napalm in the morning
11. Dylan was the real writer of Stairway to Heaven
12. Josh and Dylan invented water
13. Dylan and Josh drove Waldo into hiding
14. Dylan has never blinked in his entire life. ever.
15. The chief export of Josh is Awesomeness
16. There are no stupid questions, Just Stupid People
17. Behind Every Man is a Woman Rolling Her Eyes
18. Josh feels pretty
19. Ninjas are cooler than Pirates
20. Josh is awesome at video games
cause.mission: aid Dylan Shade and Joshua Ikebuchi's University Adventures.
cause.name: Help Fund Dylan Shade and Joshua Ikebuchi's University Experience
